heading: Exemption
text:
The provisions of this article shall not apply to:
   1.   Signs with a surface area of 200 square feet (19 m 2) or less that are located no higher than 3 feet (914mm) above the floor
          of the second story of the building on which the sign is located; and
   2.    Signs under the control of an outdoor advertising company and included on a certified list of signs, sign structures, and
         sign locations under the control of such company required to be filed with the department pursuant to this chapter.
